title: Leave It to Susan
text: Leave It to Susan is a 1918 American <a href="silent%20film">silent</a> <a href="comedy%20film">comedy</a> <a href="Western%20%28genre%29">Western</a> film directed by <a href="Clarence%20G.%20Badger">Clarence G. Badger</a> and written by <a href="Rex%20Taylor">Rex Taylor</a> and Irma Whipley Taylor. The film stars <a href="Madge%20Kennedy">Madge Kennedy</a>, <a href="Wallace%20MacDonald">Wallace MacDonald</a>, and <a href="Alfred%20Hollingsworth">Alfred Hollingsworth</a>.
